document.full_text: senior u.s. federal reserve official charles plosser warned on thursday of the risks to future inflation from its program of quantitative easing and reiterated that the bar for more stimulus for the economy was "very high."
document.title: fed's plosser warns of inflation risks from qe
lines_and_colors: senior u.s. federal reserve official charles plosser warned on thursday of the risks to future inflation from its program of quantitative easing and reiterated that the bar for more stimulus for the economy was "very high."
